event_highlights_video::clip_card_6::goa: Talk to any significant people at the event. This might be the main performer or speaker. This might be a dignitary or politician or celebrity in attendance.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_2::goa: Shoot one clip that sums up what the event is about. A single image that captures its energy and its purpose.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_0::goa: Show the location. A wide shot of the location, or entrance to the event.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_7::goa: Look for a climax or dramatic finish, record it. The end of a game or a performance or even a speech, for example.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_3::goa: Pay attention to the people in attendance, capture what makes them unique as best you can.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_1::goa: Show us people attending the event or reacting to something happening at the event. The more animated your subjects are the better.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_4::goa: Look for people putting on the event, look for moments when they interact with other people.
event_highlights_video::clip_card_5::goa: Something drew you personally to this event, be sure to record it as well as you can.
